00039 static b3Transform      getWorldTransform(b3RigidBodyData* rb)
00040 {
00041         b3Transform newTrans;
00042         newTrans.setOrigin(rb->m_pos);
00043         newTrans.setRotation(rb->m_quat);
00044         return newTrans;
00045 }

00047 static const b3Matrix3x3&       getInvInertiaTensorWorld(b3InertiaData* inertia)
00048 {
00049         return inertia->m_invInertiaWorld;
00050 }

00054 static const b3Vector3& getLinearVelocity(b3RigidBodyData* rb)
00055 {
00056         return rb->m_linVel;
00057 }
00058 
00059 static const b3Vector3& getAngularVelocity(b3RigidBodyData* rb)
00060 {
00061         return rb->m_angVel;
00062 }
00063 
00064 static b3Vector3 getVelocityInLocalPoint(b3RigidBodyData* rb, const b3Vector3& rel_pos)
00065 {
00066         //we also calculate lin/ang velocity for kinematic objects
00067         return getLinearVelocity(rb) + getAngularVelocity(rb).cross(rel_pos);
00068

00071 struct  b3ContactPoint
00072 {
00073         b3Vector3       m_positionWorldOnA;
00074         b3Vector3       m_positionWorldOnB;
00075         b3Vector3       m_normalWorldOnB;
00076         b3Scalar        m_appliedImpulse;
00077         b3Scalar        m_distance;
00078         b3Scalar        m_combinedRestitution;
00079 
00081         b3Scalar        m_combinedFriction;
00082         b3Vector3       m_lateralFrictionDir1;
00083         b3Vector3       m_lateralFrictionDir2;
00084         b3Scalar        m_appliedImpulseLateral1;
00085         b3Scalar        m_appliedImpulseLateral2;       
00086         b3Scalar        m_combinedRollingFriction;
00087         b3Scalar        m_contactMotion1;
00088         b3Scalar        m_contactMotion2;
00089         b3Scalar        m_contactCFM1;
00090         b3Scalar        m_contactCFM2;
00091         
00092         bool            m_lateralFrictionInitialized;
00093 
00094         b3Vector3       getPositionWorldOnA()
00095         {
00096                 return m_positionWorldOnA;
00097         }
00098         b3Vector3       getPositionWorldOnB()
00099         {
00100                 return m_positionWorldOnB;
00101         }
00102         b3Scalar        getDistance()
00103         {
00104                 return m_distance;
00105         }
00106 };

00108 void    getContactPoint(b3Contact4* contact, int contactIndex, b3ContactPoint& pointOut)
00109 {
00110         pointOut.m_appliedImpulse = 0.f;
00111         pointOut.m_appliedImpulseLateral1 = 0.f;
00112         pointOut.m_appliedImpulseLateral2 = 0.f;
00113         pointOut.m_combinedFriction = contact->getFrictionCoeff();
00114         pointOut.m_combinedRestitution = contact->getRestituitionCoeff();
00115         pointOut.m_combinedRollingFriction = 0.f;
00116         pointOut.m_contactCFM1 = 0.f;
00117         pointOut.m_contactCFM2 = 0.f;
00118         pointOut.m_contactMotion1 = 0.f;
00119         pointOut.m_contactMotion2 = 0.f;
00120         pointOut.m_distance = contact->getPenetration(contactIndex);//??0.01f
00121         b3Vector3 normalOnB = contact->m_worldNormalOnB;
00122         normalOnB.normalize();//is this needed?
00123 
00124         b3Vector3 l1,l2;
00125         b3PlaneSpace1(normalOnB,l1,l2);
00126 
00127         pointOut.m_normalWorldOnB = normalOnB;
00128         //printf("normalOnB = %f,%f,%f\n",normalOnB.getX(),normalOnB.getY(),normalOnB.getZ());
00129         pointOut.m_lateralFrictionDir1 = l1;
00130         pointOut.m_lateralFrictionDir2 = l2;
00131         pointOut.m_lateralFrictionInitialized = true;
00132         
00133         
00134         b3Vector3 worldPosB = contact->m_worldPosB[contactIndex];
00135         pointOut.m_positionWorldOnB = worldPosB;
00136         pointOut.m_positionWorldOnA = worldPosB+normalOnB*pointOut.m_distance;
00137 }

00139 int     getNumContacts(b3Contact4* contact)

00141         return contact->getNPoints();

00156 void    b3PgsJacobiSolver::solveContacts(int numBodies, b3RigidBodyData* bodies, b3InertiaData* inertias, int numContacts, b3Contact4* contacts, int numConstraints, b3TypedConstraint** constraints)
00157 {
00158         b3ContactSolverInfo infoGlobal;
00159         infoGlobal.m_splitImpulse = false;
00160         infoGlobal.m_timeStep = 1.f/60.f;
00161         infoGlobal.m_numIterations = 4;//4;
00162 //      infoGlobal.m_solverMode|=B3_SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS|B3_SOLVER_INTERLEAVE_CONTACT_AND_FRICTION_CONSTRAINTS|B3_SOLVER_DISABLE_VELOCITY_DEPENDENT_FRICTION_DIRECTION;
00163         //infoGlobal.m_solverMode|=B3_SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS|B3_SOLVER_INTERLEAVE_CONTACT_AND_FRICTION_CONSTRAINTS;
00164         infoGlobal.m_solverMode|=B3_SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS;
00165 
00166         //if (infoGlobal.m_solverMode & B3_SOLVER_INTERLEAVE_CONTACT_AND_FRICTION_CONSTRAINTS)
00167         //if ((infoGlobal.m_solverMode & B3_SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS) && (infoGlobal.m_solverMode & B3_SOLVER_DISABLE_VELOCITY_DEPENDENT_FRICTION_DIRECTION))
00168                                 
00169 
00170         solveGroup(bodies,inertias,numBodies,contacts,numContacts,constraints,numConstraints,infoGlobal);
00171 
00172         if (!numContacts)
00173                 return;
00174 }

00178 
00180 b3Scalar b3PgsJacobiSolver::solveGroup(b3RigidBodyData* bodies,
00181                                                                                 b3InertiaData* inertias, 
00182                                                                                 int numBodies,
00183                                                                                 b3Contact4* manifoldPtr, 
00184                                                                                 int numManifolds,
00185                                                                                 b3TypedConstraint** constraints,
00186                                                                                 int numConstraints,
00187                                                                                 const b3ContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal)
00188 {
00189 
00190         B3_PROFILE("solveGroup");
00191         //you need to provide at least some bodies
00192         
00193         solveGroupCacheFriendlySetup( bodies, inertias,numBodies, manifoldPtr,  numManifolds,constraints, numConstraints,infoGlobal);
00194 
00195         solveGroupCacheFriendlyIterations(constraints, numConstraints,infoGlobal);
00196 
00197         solveGroupCacheFriendlyFinish(bodies, inertias,numBodies, infoGlobal);
00198         
00199         return 0.f;
00200 }

00210 #ifdef USE_SIMD
00211 #include <emmintrin.h>
00212 #define b3VecSplat(x, e) _mm_shuffle_ps(x, x, _MM_SHUFFLE(e,e,e,e))
00213 static inline __m128 b3SimdDot3( __m128 vec0, __m128 vec1 )
00214 {
00215         __m128 result = _mm_mul_ps( vec0, vec1);
00216         return _mm_add_ps( b3VecSplat( result, 0 ), _mm_add_ps( b3VecSplat( result, 1 ), b3VecSplat( result, 2 ) ) );
00217 }
00218 #endif//USE_SIMD

00220 // Project Gauss Seidel or the equivalent Sequential Impulse
00221 void b3PgsJacobiSolver::resolveSingleConstraintRowGenericSIMD(b3SolverBody& body1,b3SolverBody& body2,const b3SolverConstraint& c)
00222 {
00223 #ifdef USE_SIMD
00224         __m128 cpAppliedImp = _mm_set1_ps(c.m_appliedImpulse);
00225         __m128  lowerLimit1 = _mm_set1_ps(c.m_lowerLimit);
00226         __m128  upperLimit1 = _mm_set1_ps(c.m_upperLimit);
00227         __m128 deltaImpulse = _mm_sub_ps(_mm_set1_ps(c.m_rhs), _mm_mul_ps(_mm_set1_ps(c.m_appliedImpulse),_mm_set1_ps(c.m_cfm)));
00228         __m128 deltaVel1Dotn    =       _mm_add_ps(b3SimdDot3(c.m_contactNormal.mVec128,body1.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128), b3SimdDot3(c.m_relpos1CrossNormal.mVec128,body1.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128));
00229         __m128 deltaVel2Dotn    =       _mm_sub_ps(b3SimdDot3(c.m_relpos2CrossNormal.mVec128,body2.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128),b3SimdDot3((c.m_contactNormal).mVec128,body2.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128));
00230         deltaImpulse    =       _mm_sub_ps(deltaImpulse,_mm_mul_ps(deltaVel1Dotn,_mm_set1_ps(c.m_jacDiagABInv)));
00231         deltaImpulse    =       _mm_sub_ps(deltaImpulse,_mm_mul_ps(deltaVel2Dotn,_mm_set1_ps(c.m_jacDiagABInv)));
00232         b3SimdScalar sum = _mm_add_ps(cpAppliedImp,deltaImpulse);
00233         b3SimdScalar resultLowerLess,resultUpperLess;
00234         resultLowerLess = _mm_cmplt_ps(sum,lowerLimit1);
00235         resultUpperLess = _mm_cmplt_ps(sum,upperLimit1);
00236         __m128 lowMinApplied = _mm_sub_ps(lowerLimit1,cpAppliedImp);
00237         deltaImpulse = _mm_or_ps( _mm_and_ps(resultLowerLess, lowMinApplied), _mm_andnot_ps(resultLowerLess, deltaImpulse) );
00238         c.m_appliedImpulse = _mm_or_ps( _mm_and_ps(resultLowerLess, lowerLimit1), _mm_andnot_ps(resultLowerLess, sum) );
00239         __m128 upperMinApplied = _mm_sub_ps(upperLimit1,cpAppliedImp);
00240         deltaImpulse = _mm_or_ps( _mm_and_ps(resultUpperLess, deltaImpulse), _mm_andnot_ps(resultUpperLess, upperMinApplied) );
00241         c.m_appliedImpulse = _mm_or_ps( _mm_and_ps(resultUpperLess, c.m_appliedImpulse), _mm_andnot_ps(resultUpperLess, upperLimit1) );
00242         __m128  linearComponentA = _mm_mul_ps(c.m_contactNormal.mVec128,body1.internalGetInvMass().mVec128);
00243         __m128  linearComponentB = _mm_mul_ps((c.m_contactNormal).mVec128,body2.internalGetInvMass().mVec128);
00244         __m128 impulseMagnitude = deltaImpulse;
00245         body1.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128 = _mm_add_ps(body1.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128,_mm_mul_ps(linearComponentA,impulseMagnitude));
00246         body1.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128 = _mm_add_ps(body1.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128 ,_mm_mul_ps(c.m_angularComponentA.mVec128,impulseMagnitude));
00247         body2.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128 = _mm_sub_ps(body2.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128,_mm_mul_ps(linearComponentB,impulseMagnitude));
00248         body2.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128 = _mm_add_ps(body2.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128 ,_mm_mul_ps(c.m_angularComponentB.mVec128,impulseMagnitude));
00249 #else
00250         resolveSingleConstraintRowGeneric(body1,body2,c);
00251 #endif
00252 }
00253 
00254 // Project Gauss Seidel or the equivalent Sequential Impulse
00255  void b3PgsJacobiSolver::resolveSingleConstraintRowGeneric(b3SolverBody& body1,b3SolverBody& body2,const b3SolverConstraint& c)
00256 {
00257         b3Scalar deltaImpulse = c.m_rhs-b3Scalar(c.m_appliedImpulse)*c.m_cfm;
00258         const b3Scalar deltaVel1Dotn    =       c.m_contactNormal.dot(body1.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity())   + c.m_relpos1CrossNormal.dot(body1.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity());
00259         const b3Scalar deltaVel2Dotn    =       -c.m_contactNormal.dot(body2.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity()) + c.m_relpos2CrossNormal.dot(body2.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity());
00260 
00261 //      const b3Scalar delta_rel_vel    =       deltaVel1Dotn-deltaVel2Dotn;
00262         deltaImpulse    -=      deltaVel1Dotn*c.m_jacDiagABInv;
00263         deltaImpulse    -=      deltaVel2Dotn*c.m_jacDiagABInv;
00264 
00265         const b3Scalar sum = b3Scalar(c.m_appliedImpulse) + deltaImpulse;
00266         if (sum < c.m_lowerLimit)
00267         {
00268                 deltaImpulse = c.m_lowerLimit-c.m_appliedImpulse;
00269                 c.m_appliedImpulse = c.m_lowerLimit;
00270         }
00271         else if (sum > c.m_upperLimit) 
00272         {
00273                 deltaImpulse = c.m_upperLimit-c.m_appliedImpulse;
00274                 c.m_appliedImpulse = c.m_upperLimit;
00275         }
00276         else
00277         {
00278                 c.m_appliedImpulse = sum;
00279         }
00280 
00281         body1.internalApplyImpulse(c.m_contactNormal*body1.internalGetInvMass(),c.m_angularComponentA,deltaImpulse);
00282         body2.internalApplyImpulse(-c.m_contactNormal*body2.internalGetInvMass(),c.m_angularComponentB,deltaImpulse);
00283 }
00284 
00285  void b3PgsJacobiSolver::resolveSingleConstraintRowLowerLimitSIMD(b3SolverBody& body1,b3SolverBody& body2,const b3SolverConstraint& c)
00286 {
00287 #ifdef USE_SIMD
00288         __m128 cpAppliedImp = _mm_set1_ps(c.m_appliedImpulse);
00289         __m128  lowerLimit1 = _mm_set1_ps(c.m_lowerLimit);
00290         __m128  upperLimit1 = _mm_set1_ps(c.m_upperLimit);
00291         __m128 deltaImpulse = _mm_sub_ps(_mm_set1_ps(c.m_rhs), _mm_mul_ps(_mm_set1_ps(c.m_appliedImpulse),_mm_set1_ps(c.m_cfm)));
00292         __m128 deltaVel1Dotn    =       _mm_add_ps(b3SimdDot3(c.m_contactNormal.mVec128,body1.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128), b3SimdDot3(c.m_relpos1CrossNormal.mVec128,body1.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128));
00293         __m128 deltaVel2Dotn    =       _mm_sub_ps(b3SimdDot3(c.m_relpos2CrossNormal.mVec128,body2.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128),b3SimdDot3((c.m_contactNormal).mVec128,body2.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128));
00294         deltaImpulse    =       _mm_sub_ps(deltaImpulse,_mm_mul_ps(deltaVel1Dotn,_mm_set1_ps(c.m_jacDiagABInv)));
00295         deltaImpulse    =       _mm_sub_ps(deltaImpulse,_mm_mul_ps(deltaVel2Dotn,_mm_set1_ps(c.m_jacDiagABInv)));
00296         b3SimdScalar sum = _mm_add_ps(cpAppliedImp,deltaImpulse);
00297         b3SimdScalar resultLowerLess,resultUpperLess;
00298         resultLowerLess = _mm_cmplt_ps(sum,lowerLimit1);
00299         resultUpperLess = _mm_cmplt_ps(sum,upperLimit1);
00300         __m128 lowMinApplied = _mm_sub_ps(lowerLimit1,cpAppliedImp);
00301         deltaImpulse = _mm_or_ps( _mm_and_ps(resultLowerLess, lowMinApplied), _mm_andnot_ps(resultLowerLess, deltaImpulse) );
00302         c.m_appliedImpulse = _mm_or_ps( _mm_and_ps(resultLowerLess, lowerLimit1), _mm_andnot_ps(resultLowerLess, sum) );
00303         __m128  linearComponentA = _mm_mul_ps(c.m_contactNormal.mVec128,body1.internalGetInvMass().mVec128);
00304         __m128  linearComponentB = _mm_mul_ps((c.m_contactNormal).mVec128,body2.internalGetInvMass().mVec128);
00305         __m128 impulseMagnitude = deltaImpulse;
00306         body1.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128 = _mm_add_ps(body1.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128,_mm_mul_ps(linearComponentA,impulseMagnitude));
00307         body1.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128 = _mm_add_ps(body1.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128 ,_mm_mul_ps(c.m_angularComponentA.mVec128,impulseMagnitude));
00308         body2.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128 = _mm_sub_ps(body2.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().mVec128,_mm_mul_ps(linearComponentB,impulseMagnitude));
00309         body2.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128 = _mm_add_ps(body2.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().mVec128 ,_mm_mul_ps(c.m_angularComponentB.mVec128,impulseMagnitude));
00310 #else
00311         resolveSingleConstraintRowLowerLimit(body1,body2,c);
00312 #endif
00313 }
00314 
00315 // Project Gauss Seidel or the equivalent Sequential Impulse
00316  void b3PgsJacobiSolver::resolveSingleConstraintRowLowerLimit(b3SolverBody& body1,b3SolverBody& body2,const b3SolverConstraint& c)
00317 {
00318         b3Scalar deltaImpulse = c.m_rhs-b3Scalar(c.m_appliedImpulse)*c.m_cfm;
00319         const b3Scalar deltaVel1Dotn    =       c.m_contactNormal.dot(body1.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity())   + c.m_relpos1CrossNormal.dot(body1.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity());
00320         const b3Scalar deltaVel2Dotn    =       -c.m_contactNormal.dot(body2.internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity()) + c.m_relpos2CrossNormal.dot(body2.internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity());
00321 
00322         deltaImpulse    -=      deltaVel1Dotn*c.m_jacDiagABInv;
00323         deltaImpulse    -=      deltaVel2Dotn*c.m_jacDiagABInv;
00324         const b3Scalar sum = b3Scalar(c.m_appliedImpulse) + deltaImpulse;
00325         if (sum < c.m_lowerLimit)
00326         {
00327                 deltaImpulse = c.m_lowerLimit-c.m_appliedImpulse;
00328                 c.m_appliedImpulse = c.m_lowerLimit;
00329         }
00330         else
00331         {
00332                 c.m_appliedImpulse = sum;
00333         }
00334         body1.internalApplyImpulse(c.m_contactNormal*body1.internalGetInvMass(),c.m_angularComponentA,deltaImpulse);
00335         body2.internalApplyImpulse(-c.m_contactNormal*body2.internalGetInvMass(),c.m_angularComponentB,deltaImpulse);
00336 }

00339 void    b3PgsJacobiSolver::resolveSplitPenetrationImpulseCacheFriendly(
00340         b3SolverBody& body1,
00341         b3SolverBody& body2,
00342         const b3SolverConstraint& c)
00343 {
00344                 if (c.m_rhsPenetration)
00345         {
00346                         m_numSplitImpulseRecoveries++;
00347                         b3Scalar deltaImpulse = c.m_rhsPenetration-b3Scalar(c.m_appliedPushImpulse)*c.m_cfm;
00348                         const b3Scalar deltaVel1Dotn    =       c.m_contactNormal.dot(body1.internalGetPushVelocity())  + c.m_relpos1CrossNormal.dot(body1.internalGetTurnVelocity());
00349                         const b3Scalar deltaVel2Dotn    =       -c.m_contactNormal.dot(body2.internalGetPushVelocity()) + c.m_relpos2CrossNormal.dot(body2.internalGetTurnVelocity());
00350 
00351                         deltaImpulse    -=      deltaVel1Dotn*c.m_jacDiagABInv;
00352                         deltaImpulse    -=      deltaVel2Dotn*c.m_jacDiagABInv;
00353                         const b3Scalar sum = b3Scalar(c.m_appliedPushImpulse) + deltaImpulse;
00354                         if (sum < c.m_lowerLimit)
00355                         {
00356                                 deltaImpulse = c.m_lowerLimit-c.m_appliedPushImpulse;
00357                                 c.m_appliedPushImpulse = c.m_lowerLimit;
00358                         }
00359                         else
00360                         {
00361                                 c.m_appliedPushImpulse = sum;
00362                         }
00363                         body1.internalApplyPushImpulse(c.m_contactNormal*body1.internalGetInvMass(),c.m_angularComponentA,deltaImpulse);
00364                         body2.internalApplyPushImpulse(-c.m_contactNormal*body2.internalGetInvMass(),c.m_angularComponentB,deltaImpulse);
00365         }
00366 }
00367 
00368  void b3PgsJacobiSolver::resolveSplitPenetrationSIMD(b3SolverBody& body1,b3SolverBody& body2,const b3SolverConstraint& c)
00369 {
00370 #ifdef USE_SIMD
00371         if (!c.m_rhsPenetration)
00372                 return;
00373 
00374         m_numSplitImpulseRecoveries++;
00375 
00376         __m128 cpAppliedImp = _mm_set1_ps(c.m_appliedPushImpulse);
00377         __m128  lowerLimit1 = _mm_set1_ps(c.m_lowerLimit);
00378         __m128  upperLimit1 = _mm_set1_ps(c.m_upperLimit);
00379         __m128 deltaImpulse = _mm_sub_ps(_mm_set1_ps(c.m_rhsPenetration), _mm_mul_ps(_mm_set1_ps(c.m_appliedPushImpulse),_mm_set1_ps(c.m_cfm)));
00380         __m128 deltaVel1Dotn    =       _mm_add_ps(b3SimdDot3(c.m_contactNormal.mVec128,body1.internalGetPushVelocity().mVec128), b3SimdDot3(c.m_relpos1CrossNormal.mVec128,body1.internalGetTurnVelocity().mVec128));
00381         __m128 deltaVel2Dotn    =       _mm_sub_ps(b3SimdDot3(c.m_relpos2CrossNormal.mVec128,body2.internalGetTurnVelocity().mVec128),b3SimdDot3((c.m_contactNormal).mVec128,body2.internalGetPushVelocity().mVec128));
00382         deltaImpulse    =       _mm_sub_ps(deltaImpulse,_mm_mul_ps(deltaVel1Dotn,_mm_set1_ps(c.m_jacDiagABInv)));
00383         deltaImpulse    =       _mm_sub_ps(deltaImpulse,_mm_mul_ps(deltaVel2Dotn,_mm_set1_ps(c.m_jacDiagABInv)));
00384         b3SimdScalar sum = _mm_add_ps(cpAppliedImp,deltaImpulse);
00385         b3SimdScalar resultLowerLess,resultUpperLess;
00386         resultLowerLess = _mm_cmplt_ps(sum,lowerLimit1);
00387         resultUpperLess = _mm_cmplt_ps(sum,upperLimit1);
00388         __m128 lowMinApplied = _mm_sub_ps(lowerLimit1,cpAppliedImp);
00389         deltaImpulse = _mm_or_ps( _mm_and_ps(resultLowerLess, lowMinApplied), _mm_andnot_ps(resultLowerLess, deltaImpulse) );
00390         c.m_appliedPushImpulse = _mm_or_ps( _mm_and_ps(resultLowerLess, lowerLimit1), _mm_andnot_ps(resultLowerLess, sum) );
00391         __m128  linearComponentA = _mm_mul_ps(c.m_contactNormal.mVec128,body1.internalGetInvMass().mVec128);
00392         __m128  linearComponentB = _mm_mul_ps((c.m_contactNormal).mVec128,body2.internalGetInvMass().mVec128);
00393         __m128 impulseMagnitude = deltaImpulse;
00394         body1.internalGetPushVelocity().mVec128 = _mm_add_ps(body1.internalGetPushVelocity().mVec128,_mm_mul_ps(linearComponentA,impulseMagnitude));
00395         body1.internalGetTurnVelocity().mVec128 = _mm_add_ps(body1.internalGetTurnVelocity().mVec128 ,_mm_mul_ps(c.m_angularComponentA.mVec128,impulseMagnitude));
00396         body2.internalGetPushVelocity().mVec128 = _mm_sub_ps(body2.internalGetPushVelocity().mVec128,_mm_mul_ps(linearComponentB,impulseMagnitude));
00397         body2.internalGetTurnVelocity().mVec128 = _mm_add_ps(body2.internalGetTurnVelocity().mVec128 ,_mm_mul_ps(c.m_angularComponentB.mVec128,impulseMagnitude));
00398 #else
00399         resolveSplitPenetrationImpulseCacheFriendly(body1,body2,c);
00400 #endif
00401 }
00402 
00403 
00404 
00405 unsigned long b3PgsJacobiSolver::b3Rand2()
00406 {
00407         m_btSeed2 = (1664525L*m_btSeed2 + 1013904223L) & 0xffffffff;
00408         return m_btSeed2;
00409 }
00410 
00411 
00412 
00413 //See ODE: adam's all-int straightforward(?) dRandInt (0..n-1)
00414 int b3PgsJacobiSolver::b3RandInt2 (int n)
00415 {
00416         // seems good; xor-fold and modulus
00417         const unsigned long un = static_cast<unsigned long>(n);
00418         unsigned long r = b3Rand2();
00419 
00420         // note: probably more aggressive than it needs to be -- might be
00421         //       able to get away without one or two of the innermost branches.
00422         if (un <= 0x00010000UL) {
00423                 r ^= (r >> 16);
00424                 if (un <= 0x00000100UL) {
00425                         r ^= (r >> 8);
00426                         if (un <= 0x00000010UL) {
00427                                 r ^= (r >> 4);
00428                                 if (un <= 0x00000004UL) {
00429                                         r ^= (r >> 2);
00430                                         if (un <= 0x00000002UL) {
00431                                                 r ^= (r >> 1);
00432                                         }
00433                                 }
00434                         }
00435                 }
00436         }
00437 
00438         return (int) (r % un);
00439 }
00440 
00441 
00442 
00443 void    b3PgsJacobiSolver::initSolverBody(int bodyIndex, b3SolverBody* solverBody, b3RigidBodyData* rb)
00444 {
00445 
00446         solverBody->m_deltaLinearVelocity.setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
00447         solverBody->m_deltaAngularVelocity.setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
00448         solverBody->internalGetPushVelocity().setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
00449         solverBody->internalGetTurnVelocity().setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
00450 
00451         if (rb)
00452         {
00453                 solverBody->m_worldTransform = getWorldTransform(rb);
00454                 solverBody->internalSetInvMass(b3MakeVector3(rb->m_invMass,rb->m_invMass,rb->m_invMass));
00455                 solverBody->m_originalBodyIndex = bodyIndex;
00456                 solverBody->m_angularFactor = b3MakeVector3(1,1,1);
00457                 solverBody->m_linearFactor = b3MakeVector3(1,1,1);
00458                 solverBody->m_linearVelocity = getLinearVelocity(rb);
00459                 solverBody->m_angularVelocity = getAngularVelocity(rb);
00460         } else
00461         {
00462                 solverBody->m_worldTransform.setIdentity();
00463                 solverBody->internalSetInvMass(b3MakeVector3(0,0,0));
00464                 solverBody->m_originalBodyIndex = bodyIndex;
00465                 solverBody->m_angularFactor.setValue(1,1,1);
00466                 solverBody->m_linearFactor.setValue(1,1,1);
00467                 solverBody->m_linearVelocity.setValue(0,0,0);
00468                 solverBody->m_angularVelocity.setValue(0,0,0);
00469         }
00470 
00471 
00472 }

00478 
00479 b3Scalar b3PgsJacobiSolver::restitutionCurve(b3Scalar rel_vel, b3Scalar restitution)
00480 {
00481         b3Scalar rest = restitution * -rel_vel;
00482         return rest;
00483 }

00488 
00489 
00490 void b3PgsJacobiSolver::setupFrictionConstraint(b3RigidBodyData* bodies,b3InertiaData* inertias, b3SolverConstraint& solverConstraint, const b3Vector3& normalAxis,int  solverBodyIdA,int solverBodyIdB,b3ContactPoint& cp,const b3Vector3& rel_pos1,const b3Vector3& rel_pos2,b3RigidBodyData* colObj0,b3RigidBodyData* colObj1, b3Scalar relaxation, b3Scalar desiredVelocity, b3Scalar cfmSlip)
00491 {
00492 
00493         
00494         solverConstraint.m_contactNormal = normalAxis;
00495         b3SolverBody& solverBodyA = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdA];
00496         b3SolverBody& solverBodyB = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdB];
00497 
00498         b3RigidBodyData* body0 = &bodies[solverBodyA.m_originalBodyIndex];
00499         b3RigidBodyData* body1 = &bodies[solverBodyB.m_originalBodyIndex];
00500 
00501 
00502         solverConstraint.m_solverBodyIdA = solverBodyIdA;
00503         solverConstraint.m_solverBodyIdB = solverBodyIdB;
00504 
00505         solverConstraint.m_friction = cp.m_combinedFriction;
00506         solverConstraint.m_originalContactPoint = 0;
00507 
00508         solverConstraint.m_appliedImpulse = 0.f;
00509         solverConstraint.m_appliedPushImpulse = 0.f;
00510 
00511         {
00512                 b3Vector3 ftorqueAxis1 = rel_pos1.cross(solverConstraint.m_contactNormal);
00513                 solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal = ftorqueAxis1;
00514                 solverConstraint.m_angularComponentA = body0 ? getInvInertiaTensorWorld(&inertias[solverBodyA.m_originalBodyIndex])*ftorqueAxis1 : b3MakeVector3(0,0,0);
00515         }
00516         {
00517                 b3Vector3 ftorqueAxis1 = rel_pos2.cross(-solverConstraint.m_contactNormal);
00518                 solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal = ftorqueAxis1;
00519                 solverConstraint.m_angularComponentB = body1 ? getInvInertiaTensorWorld(&inertias[solverBodyB.m_originalBodyIndex])*ftorqueAxis1 : b3MakeVector3(0,0,0);
00520         }
00521 
00522         b3Scalar scaledDenom;
00523 
00524         {
00525                 b3Vector3 vec;
00526                 b3Scalar denom0 = 0.f;
00527                 b3Scalar denom1 = 0.f;
00528                 if (body0)
00529                 {
00530                         vec = ( solverConstraint.m_angularComponentA).cross(rel_pos1);
00531                         denom0 = body0->m_invMass + normalAxis.dot(vec);
00532                 }
00533                 if (body1)
00534                 {
00535                         vec = ( -solverConstraint.m_angularComponentB).cross(rel_pos2);
00536                         denom1 = body1->m_invMass + normalAxis.dot(vec);
00537                 }
00538 
00539                 b3Scalar denom;
00540                 if (m_usePgs)
00541                 {
00542                         scaledDenom = denom = relaxation/(denom0+denom1);
00543                 } else
00544                 {
00545                         denom = relaxation/(denom0+denom1);
00546                         b3Scalar countA = body0->m_invMass ? b3Scalar(m_bodyCount[solverBodyA.m_originalBodyIndex]): 1.f;
00547                         b3Scalar countB = body1->m_invMass ? b3Scalar(m_bodyCount[solverBodyB.m_originalBodyIndex]): 1.f;
00548 
00549                         scaledDenom = relaxation/(denom0*countA+denom1*countB);
00550                 }
00551 
00552                 solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv = denom;
00553         }
00554 
00555         {
00556                 
00557 
00558                 b3Scalar rel_vel;
00559                 b3Scalar vel1Dotn = solverConstraint.m_contactNormal.dot(body0?solverBodyA.m_linearVelocity:b3MakeVector3(0,0,0)) 
00560                         + solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal.dot(body0?solverBodyA.m_angularVelocity:b3MakeVector3(0,0,0));
00561                 b3Scalar vel2Dotn = -solverConstraint.m_contactNormal.dot(body1?solverBodyB.m_linearVelocity:b3MakeVector3(0,0,0)) 
00562                         + solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal.dot(body1?solverBodyB.m_angularVelocity:b3MakeVector3(0,0,0));
00563 
00564                 rel_vel = vel1Dotn+vel2Dotn;
00565 
00566 //              b3Scalar positionalError = 0.f;
00567 
00568                 b3SimdScalar velocityError =  desiredVelocity - rel_vel;
00569                 b3SimdScalar    velocityImpulse = velocityError * b3SimdScalar(scaledDenom);//solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv);
00570                 solverConstraint.m_rhs = velocityImpulse;
00571                 solverConstraint.m_cfm = cfmSlip;
00572                 solverConstraint.m_lowerLimit = 0;
00573                 solverConstraint.m_upperLimit = 1e10f;
00574                 
00575         }
00576 }
00577 
00578 b3SolverConstraint&     b3PgsJacobiSolver::addFrictionConstraint(b3RigidBodyData* bodies,b3InertiaData* inertias, const b3Vector3& normalAxis,int solverBodyIdA,int solverBodyIdB,int frictionIndex,b3ContactPoint& cp,const b3Vector3& rel_pos1,const b3Vector3& rel_pos2,b3RigidBodyData* colObj0,b3RigidBodyData* colObj1, b3Scalar relaxation, b3Scalar desiredVelocity, b3Scalar cfmSlip)
00579 {
00580         b3SolverConstraint& solverConstraint = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool.expandNonInitializing();
00581         solverConstraint.m_frictionIndex = frictionIndex;
00582         setupFrictionConstraint(bodies,inertias,solverConstraint, normalAxis, solverBodyIdA, solverBodyIdB, cp, rel_pos1, rel_pos2, 
00583                                                         colObj0, colObj1, relaxation, desiredVelocity, cfmSlip);
00584         return solverConstraint;
00585 }
00586 
00587 
00588 void b3PgsJacobiSolver::setupRollingFrictionConstraint(b3RigidBodyData* bodies,b3InertiaData* inertias, b3SolverConstraint& solverConstraint, const b3Vector3& normalAxis1,int solverBodyIdA,int  solverBodyIdB,
00589                                                                         b3ContactPoint& cp,const b3Vector3& rel_pos1,const b3Vector3& rel_pos2,
00590                                                                         b3RigidBodyData* colObj0,b3RigidBodyData* colObj1, b3Scalar relaxation, 
00591                                                                         b3Scalar desiredVelocity, b3Scalar cfmSlip)
00592 
00593 {
00594         b3Vector3 normalAxis=b3MakeVector3(0,0,0);
00595 
00596 
00597         solverConstraint.m_contactNormal = normalAxis;
00598         b3SolverBody& solverBodyA = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdA];
00599         b3SolverBody& solverBodyB = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdB];
00600 
00601         b3RigidBodyData* body0 = &bodies[m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdA].m_originalBodyIndex];
00602         b3RigidBodyData* body1 = &bodies[m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdB].m_originalBodyIndex];
00603 
00604         solverConstraint.m_solverBodyIdA = solverBodyIdA;
00605         solverConstraint.m_solverBodyIdB = solverBodyIdB;
00606 
00607         solverConstraint.m_friction = cp.m_combinedRollingFriction;
00608         solverConstraint.m_originalContactPoint = 0;
00609 
00610         solverConstraint.m_appliedImpulse = 0.f;
00611         solverConstraint.m_appliedPushImpulse = 0.f;
00612 
00613         {
00614                 b3Vector3 ftorqueAxis1 = -normalAxis1;
00615                 solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal = ftorqueAxis1;
00616                 solverConstraint.m_angularComponentA = body0 ? getInvInertiaTensorWorld(&inertias[solverBodyA.m_originalBodyIndex])*ftorqueAxis1 : b3MakeVector3(0,0,0);
00617         }
00618         {
00619                 b3Vector3 ftorqueAxis1 = normalAxis1;
00620                 solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal = ftorqueAxis1;
00621                 solverConstraint.m_angularComponentB = body1 ? getInvInertiaTensorWorld(&inertias[solverBodyB.m_originalBodyIndex])*ftorqueAxis1 : b3MakeVector3(0,0,0);
00622         }
00623 
00624 
00625         {
00626                 b3Vector3 iMJaA = body0?getInvInertiaTensorWorld(&inertias[solverBodyA.m_originalBodyIndex])*solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal:b3MakeVector3(0,0,0);
00627                 b3Vector3 iMJaB = body1?getInvInertiaTensorWorld(&inertias[solverBodyB.m_originalBodyIndex])*solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal:b3MakeVector3(0,0,0);
00628                 b3Scalar sum = 0;
00629                 sum += iMJaA.dot(solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal);
00630                 sum += iMJaB.dot(solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal);
00631                 solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv = b3Scalar(1.)/sum;
00632         }
00633 
00634         {
00635                 
00636 
00637                 b3Scalar rel_vel;
00638                 b3Scalar vel1Dotn = solverConstraint.m_contactNormal.dot(body0?solverBodyA.m_linearVelocity:b3MakeVector3(0,0,0)) 
00639                         + solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal.dot(body0?solverBodyA.m_angularVelocity:b3MakeVector3(0,0,0));
00640                 b3Scalar vel2Dotn = -solverConstraint.m_contactNormal.dot(body1?solverBodyB.m_linearVelocity:b3MakeVector3(0,0,0)) 
00641                         + solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal.dot(body1?solverBodyB.m_angularVelocity:b3MakeVector3(0,0,0));
00642 
00643                 rel_vel = vel1Dotn+vel2Dotn;
00644 
00645 //              b3Scalar positionalError = 0.f;
00646 
00647                 b3SimdScalar velocityError =  desiredVelocity - rel_vel;
00648                 b3SimdScalar    velocityImpulse = velocityError * b3SimdScalar(solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv);
00649                 solverConstraint.m_rhs = velocityImpulse;
00650                 solverConstraint.m_cfm = cfmSlip;
00651                 solverConstraint.m_lowerLimit = 0;
00652                 solverConstraint.m_upperLimit = 1e10f;
00653                 
00654         }
00655 }
