00661 
00662 
00663 
00664 b3SolverConstraint&     b3PgsJacobiSolver::addRollingFrictionConstraint(b3RigidBodyData* bodies,b3InertiaData* inertias,const b3Vector3& normalAxis,int solverBodyIdA,int solverBodyIdB,int frictionIndex,b3ContactPoint& cp,const b3Vector3& rel_pos1,const b3Vector3& rel_pos2,b3RigidBodyData* colObj0,b3RigidBodyData* colObj1, b3Scalar relaxation, b3Scalar desiredVelocity, b3Scalar cfmSlip)
00665 {
00666         b3SolverConstraint& solverConstraint = m_tmpSolverContactRollingFrictionConstraintPool.expandNonInitializing();
00667         solverConstraint.m_frictionIndex = frictionIndex;
00668         setupRollingFrictionConstraint(bodies,inertias,solverConstraint, normalAxis, solverBodyIdA, solverBodyIdB, cp, rel_pos1, rel_pos2, 
00669                                                         colObj0, colObj1, relaxation, desiredVelocity, cfmSlip);
00670         return solverConstraint;
00671 }
00672 
00673 
00674 int     b3PgsJacobiSolver::getOrInitSolverBody(int bodyIndex, b3RigidBodyData* bodies,b3InertiaData* inertias)
00675 {
00676         //b3Assert(bodyIndex< m_tmpSolverBodyPool.size());
00677 
00678         b3RigidBodyData& body = bodies[bodyIndex];
00679         int curIndex = -1;
00680         if (m_usePgs || body.m_invMass==0.f)
00681         {
00682                 if (m_bodyCount[bodyIndex]<0)
00683                 {
00684                         curIndex = m_tmpSolverBodyPool.size();
00685                         b3SolverBody& solverBody = m_tmpSolverBodyPool.expand();
00686                         initSolverBody(bodyIndex,&solverBody,&body);
00687                         solverBody.m_originalBodyIndex = bodyIndex;
00688                         m_bodyCount[bodyIndex] = curIndex;
00689                 } else
00690                 {
00691                         curIndex = m_bodyCount[bodyIndex];
00692                 }
00693         } else
00694         {
00695                 b3Assert(m_bodyCount[bodyIndex]>0);
00696                 m_bodyCountCheck[bodyIndex]++;
00697                 curIndex = m_tmpSolverBodyPool.size();
00698                 b3SolverBody& solverBody = m_tmpSolverBodyPool.expand();
00699                 initSolverBody(bodyIndex,&solverBody,&body);
00700                 solverBody.m_originalBodyIndex = bodyIndex;
00701         }
00702 
00703         b3Assert(curIndex>=0);
00704         return curIndex;
00705 
00706 }
00707 #include <stdio.h>
00708 
00709 
00710 void b3PgsJacobiSolver::setupContactConstraint(b3RigidBodyData* bodies, b3InertiaData* inertias,b3SolverConstraint& solverConstraint, 
00711                                                                                                                                  int solverBodyIdA, int solverBodyIdB,
00712                                                                                                                                  b3ContactPoint& cp, const b3ContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal,
00713                                                                                                                                  b3Vector3& vel, b3Scalar& rel_vel, b3Scalar& relaxation,
00714                                                                                                                                  b3Vector3& rel_pos1, b3Vector3& rel_pos2)
00715 {
00716                         
00717                         const b3Vector3& pos1 = cp.getPositionWorldOnA();
00718                         const b3Vector3& pos2 = cp.getPositionWorldOnB();
00719 
00720                         b3SolverBody* bodyA = &m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdA];
00721                         b3SolverBody* bodyB = &m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdB];
00722 
00723                         b3RigidBodyData* rb0 = &bodies[bodyA->m_originalBodyIndex];
00724                         b3RigidBodyData* rb1 = &bodies[bodyB->m_originalBodyIndex];
00725 
00726 //                      b3Vector3 rel_pos1 = pos1 - colObj0->getWorldTransform().getOrigin(); 
00727 //                      b3Vector3 rel_pos2 = pos2 - colObj1->getWorldTransform().getOrigin();
00728                         rel_pos1 = pos1 - bodyA->getWorldTransform().getOrigin(); 
00729                         rel_pos2 = pos2 - bodyB->getWorldTransform().getOrigin();
00730 
00731                         relaxation = 1.f;
00732 
00733                         b3Vector3 torqueAxis0 = rel_pos1.cross(cp.m_normalWorldOnB);
00734                         solverConstraint.m_angularComponentA = rb0 ? getInvInertiaTensorWorld(&inertias[bodyA->m_originalBodyIndex])*torqueAxis0 : b3MakeVector3(0,0,0);
00735                         b3Vector3 torqueAxis1 = rel_pos2.cross(cp.m_normalWorldOnB);            
00736                         solverConstraint.m_angularComponentB = rb1 ? getInvInertiaTensorWorld(&inertias[bodyB->m_originalBodyIndex])*-torqueAxis1 : b3MakeVector3(0,0,0);
00737 
00738                         b3Scalar scaledDenom;
00739                                 {
00740 #ifdef COMPUTE_IMPULSE_DENOM
00741                                         b3Scalar denom0 = rb0->computeImpulseDenominator(pos1,cp.m_normalWorldOnB);
00742                                         b3Scalar denom1 = rb1->computeImpulseDenominator(pos2,cp.m_normalWorldOnB);
00743 #else                                                   
00744                                         b3Vector3 vec;
00745                                         b3Scalar denom0 = 0.f;
00746                                         b3Scalar denom1 = 0.f;
00747                                         if (rb0)
00748                                         {
00749                                                 vec = ( solverConstraint.m_angularComponentA).cross(rel_pos1);
00750                                                 denom0 = rb0->m_invMass + cp.m_normalWorldOnB.dot(vec);
00751                                         }
00752                                         if (rb1)
00753                                         {
00754                                                 vec = ( -solverConstraint.m_angularComponentB).cross(rel_pos2);
00755                                                 denom1 = rb1->m_invMass + cp.m_normalWorldOnB.dot(vec);
00756                                         }
00757 #endif //COMPUTE_IMPULSE_DENOM          
00758 
00759                                         
00760                                         b3Scalar denom;
00761                                         if (m_usePgs)
00762                                         {
00763                                                 scaledDenom = denom = relaxation/(denom0+denom1);
00764                                         } else
00765                                         {
00766                                                 denom = relaxation/(denom0+denom1);
00767 
00768                                                 b3Scalar countA = rb0->m_invMass? b3Scalar(m_bodyCount[bodyA->m_originalBodyIndex]) : 1.f;
00769                                                 b3Scalar countB = rb1->m_invMass? b3Scalar(m_bodyCount[bodyB->m_originalBodyIndex]) : 1.f;
00770                                                 scaledDenom = relaxation/(denom0*countA+denom1*countB);
00771                                         }
00772                                         solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv = denom;
00773                                 }
00774 
00775                                 solverConstraint.m_contactNormal = cp.m_normalWorldOnB;
00776                                 solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal = torqueAxis0;
00777                                 solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal = -torqueAxis1;
00778 
00779                                 b3Scalar restitution = 0.f;
00780                                 b3Scalar penetration = cp.getDistance()+infoGlobal.m_linearSlop;
00781 
00782                                 {
00783                                         b3Vector3 vel1,vel2;
00784 
00785                                         vel1 = rb0? getVelocityInLocalPoint(rb0,rel_pos1) : b3MakeVector3(0,0,0);
00786                                         vel2 = rb1? getVelocityInLocalPoint(rb1, rel_pos2) : b3MakeVector3(0,0,0);
00787 
00788         //                      b3Vector3 vel2 = rb1 ? rb1->getVelocityInLocalPoint(rel_pos2) : b3Vector3(0,0,0);
00789                                         vel  = vel1 - vel2;
00790                                         rel_vel = cp.m_normalWorldOnB.dot(vel);
00791 
00792                                         
00793 
00794                                         solverConstraint.m_friction = cp.m_combinedFriction;
00795 
00796                                 
00797                                         restitution =  restitutionCurve(rel_vel, cp.m_combinedRestitution);
00798                                         if (restitution <= b3Scalar(0.))
00799                                         {
00800                                                 restitution = 0.f;
00801                                         };
00802                                 }
00803 
00804 
00806                                 if (infoGlobal.m_solverMode & B3_SOLVER_USE_WARMSTARTING)
00807                                 {
00808                                         solverConstraint.m_appliedImpulse = cp.m_appliedImpulse * infoGlobal.m_warmstartingFactor;
00809                                         if (rb0)
00810                                                 bodyA->internalApplyImpulse(solverConstraint.m_contactNormal*bodyA->internalGetInvMass(),solverConstraint.m_angularComponentA,solverConstraint.m_appliedImpulse);
00811                                         if (rb1)
00812                                                 bodyB->internalApplyImpulse(solverConstraint.m_contactNormal*bodyB->internalGetInvMass(),-solverConstraint.m_angularComponentB,-(b3Scalar)solverConstraint.m_appliedImpulse);
00813                                 } else
00814                                 {
00815                                         solverConstraint.m_appliedImpulse = 0.f;
00816                                 }
00817 
00818                                 solverConstraint.m_appliedPushImpulse = 0.f;
00819 
00820                                 {
00821                                         b3Scalar vel1Dotn = solverConstraint.m_contactNormal.dot(rb0?bodyA->m_linearVelocity:b3MakeVector3(0,0,0)) 
00822                                                 + solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal.dot(rb0?bodyA->m_angularVelocity:b3MakeVector3(0,0,0));
00823                                         b3Scalar vel2Dotn = -solverConstraint.m_contactNormal.dot(rb1?bodyB->m_linearVelocity:b3MakeVector3(0,0,0)) 
00824                                                 + solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal.dot(rb1?bodyB->m_angularVelocity:b3MakeVector3(0,0,0));
00825                                         b3Scalar rel_vel = vel1Dotn+vel2Dotn;
00826 
00827                                         b3Scalar positionalError = 0.f;
00828                                         b3Scalar        velocityError = restitution - rel_vel;// * damping;
00829                                         
00830 
00831                                         b3Scalar erp = infoGlobal.m_erp2;
00832                                         if (!infoGlobal.m_splitImpulse || (penetration > infoGlobal.m_splitImpulsePenetrationThreshold))
00833                                         {
00834                                                 erp = infoGlobal.m_erp;
00835                                         }
00836 
00837                                         if (penetration>0)
00838                                         {
00839                                                 positionalError = 0;
00840 
00841                                                 velocityError -= penetration / infoGlobal.m_timeStep;
00842                                         } else
00843                                         {
00844                                                 positionalError = -penetration * erp/infoGlobal.m_timeStep;
00845                                         }
00846 
00847                                         b3Scalar  penetrationImpulse = positionalError*scaledDenom;//solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv;
00848                                         b3Scalar velocityImpulse = velocityError *scaledDenom;//solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv;
00849 
00850                                         if (!infoGlobal.m_splitImpulse || (penetration > infoGlobal.m_splitImpulsePenetrationThreshold))
00851                                         {
00852                                                 //combine position and velocity into rhs
00853                                                 solverConstraint.m_rhs = penetrationImpulse+velocityImpulse;
00854                                                 solverConstraint.m_rhsPenetration = 0.f;
00855 
00856                                         } else
00857                                         {
00858                                                 //split position and velocity into rhs and m_rhsPenetration
00859                                                 solverConstraint.m_rhs = velocityImpulse;
00860                                                 solverConstraint.m_rhsPenetration = penetrationImpulse;
00861                                         }
00862                                         solverConstraint.m_cfm = 0.f;
00863                                         solverConstraint.m_lowerLimit = 0;
00864                                         solverConstraint.m_upperLimit = 1e10f;
00865                                 }
00866 
00867 
00868 
00869 
00870 }
00871 
00872 
00873 
00874 void b3PgsJacobiSolver::setFrictionConstraintImpulse( b3RigidBodyData* bodies, b3InertiaData* inertias,b3SolverConstraint& solverConstraint, 
00875                                                                                                                                                 int solverBodyIdA, int solverBodyIdB,
00876                                                                                                                                  b3ContactPoint& cp, const b3ContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal)
00877 {
00878 
00879         b3SolverBody* bodyA = &m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdA];
00880         b3SolverBody* bodyB = &m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdB];
00881 
00882 
00883         {
00884                 b3SolverConstraint& frictionConstraint1 = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool[solverConstraint.m_frictionIndex];
00885                 if (infoGlobal.m_solverMode & B3_SOLVER_USE_WARMSTARTING)
00886                 {
00887                         frictionConstraint1.m_appliedImpulse = cp.m_appliedImpulseLateral1 * infoGlobal.m_warmstartingFactor;
00888                         if (bodies[bodyA->m_originalBodyIndex].m_invMass)
00889                                 bodyA->internalApplyImpulse(frictionConstraint1.m_contactNormal*bodies[bodyA->m_originalBodyIndex].m_invMass,frictionConstraint1.m_angularComponentA,frictionConstraint1.m_appliedImpulse);
00890                         if (bodies[bodyB->m_originalBodyIndex].m_invMass)
00891                                 bodyB->internalApplyImpulse(frictionConstraint1.m_contactNormal*bodies[bodyB->m_originalBodyIndex].m_invMass,-frictionConstraint1.m_angularComponentB,-(b3Scalar)frictionConstraint1.m_appliedImpulse);
00892                 } else
00893                 {
00894                         frictionConstraint1.m_appliedImpulse = 0.f;
00895                 }
00896         }
00897 
00898         if ((infoGlobal.m_solverMode & B3_SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS))
00899         {
00900                 b3SolverConstraint& frictionConstraint2 = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool[solverConstraint.m_frictionIndex+1];
00901                 if (infoGlobal.m_solverMode & B3_SOLVER_USE_WARMSTARTING)
00902                 {
00903                         frictionConstraint2.m_appliedImpulse = cp.m_appliedImpulseLateral2  * infoGlobal.m_warmstartingFactor;
00904                         if (bodies[bodyA->m_originalBodyIndex].m_invMass)
00905                                 bodyA->internalApplyImpulse(frictionConstraint2.m_contactNormal*bodies[bodyA->m_originalBodyIndex].m_invMass,frictionConstraint2.m_angularComponentA,frictionConstraint2.m_appliedImpulse);
00906                         if (bodies[bodyB->m_originalBodyIndex].m_invMass)
00907                                 bodyB->internalApplyImpulse(frictionConstraint2.m_contactNormal*bodies[bodyB->m_originalBodyIndex].m_invMass,-frictionConstraint2.m_angularComponentB,-(b3Scalar)frictionConstraint2.m_appliedImpulse);
00908                 } else
00909                 {
00910                         frictionConstraint2.m_appliedImpulse = 0.f;
00911                 }
00912         }
00913 }
00914 
00915 
00916 
00917 
00918 void    b3PgsJacobiSolver::convertContact(b3RigidBodyData* bodies, b3InertiaData* inertias,b3Contact4* manifold,const b3ContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal)
00919 {
00920         b3RigidBodyData* colObj0=0,*colObj1=0;
00921 
00922         
00923         int solverBodyIdA = getOrInitSolverBody(manifold->getBodyA(),bodies,inertias);
00924         int solverBodyIdB = getOrInitSolverBody(manifold->getBodyB(),bodies,inertias);
00925 
00926 //      b3RigidBody* bodyA = b3RigidBody::upcast(colObj0);
00927 //      b3RigidBody* bodyB = b3RigidBody::upcast(colObj1);
00928 
00929         b3SolverBody* solverBodyA = &m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdA];
00930         b3SolverBody* solverBodyB = &m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdB];
00931 
00932 
00933 
00935         if (solverBodyA->m_invMass.isZero() && solverBodyB->m_invMass.isZero())
00936                 return;
00937 
00938         int rollingFriction=1;
00939         int numContacts = getNumContacts(manifold);
00940         for (int j=0;j<numContacts;j++)
00941         {
00942 
00943                 b3ContactPoint cp;
00944                 getContactPoint(manifold,j,cp);
00945 
00946                 if (cp.getDistance() <= getContactProcessingThreshold(manifold))
00947                 {
00948                         b3Vector3 rel_pos1;
00949                         b3Vector3 rel_pos2;
00950                         b3Scalar relaxation;
00951                         b3Scalar rel_vel;
00952                         b3Vector3 vel;
00953 
00954                         int frictionIndex = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool.size();
00955                         b3SolverConstraint& solverConstraint = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool.expandNonInitializing();
00956 //                      b3RigidBody* rb0 = b3RigidBody::upcast(colObj0);
00957 //                      b3RigidBody* rb1 = b3RigidBody::upcast(colObj1);
00958                         solverConstraint.m_solverBodyIdA = solverBodyIdA;
00959                         solverConstraint.m_solverBodyIdB = solverBodyIdB;
00960 
00961                         solverConstraint.m_originalContactPoint = &cp;
00962 
00963                         setupContactConstraint(bodies,inertias,solverConstraint, solverBodyIdA, solverBodyIdB, cp, infoGlobal, vel, rel_vel, relaxation, rel_pos1, rel_pos2);
00964 
00965 //                      const b3Vector3& pos1 = cp.getPositionWorldOnA();
00966 //                      const b3Vector3& pos2 = cp.getPositionWorldOnB();
00967 
00969 
00970                         solverConstraint.m_frictionIndex = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool.size();
00971 
00972                         b3Vector3 angVelA,angVelB;
00973                         solverBodyA->getAngularVelocity(angVelA);
00974                         solverBodyB->getAngularVelocity(angVelB);                       
00975                         b3Vector3 relAngVel = angVelB-angVelA;
00976 
00977                         if ((cp.m_combinedRollingFriction>0.f) && (rollingFriction>0))
00978                         {
00979                                 //only a single rollingFriction per manifold
00980                                 rollingFriction--;
00981                                 if (relAngVel.length()>infoGlobal.m_singleAxisRollingFrictionThreshold)
00982                                 {
00983                                         relAngVel.normalize();
00984                                         if (relAngVel.length()>0.001)
00985                                                 addRollingFrictionConstraint(bodies,inertias,relAngVel,solverBodyIdA,solverBodyIdB,frictionIndex,cp,rel_pos1,rel_pos2,colObj0,colObj1, relaxation);
00986 
00987                                 } else
00988                                 {
00989                                         addRollingFrictionConstraint(bodies,inertias,cp.m_normalWorldOnB,solverBodyIdA,solverBodyIdB,frictionIndex,cp,rel_pos1,rel_pos2,colObj0,colObj1, relaxation);
00990                                         b3Vector3 axis0,axis1;
00991                                         b3PlaneSpace1(cp.m_normalWorldOnB,axis0,axis1);
00992                                         if (axis0.length()>0.001)
00993                                                 addRollingFrictionConstraint(bodies,inertias,axis0,solverBodyIdA,solverBodyIdB,frictionIndex,cp,rel_pos1,rel_pos2,colObj0,colObj1, relaxation);
00994                                         if (axis1.length()>0.001)
00995                                                 addRollingFrictionConstraint(bodies,inertias,axis1,solverBodyIdA,solverBodyIdB,frictionIndex,cp,rel_pos1,rel_pos2,colObj0,colObj1, relaxation);
00996                 
00997                                 }
00998                         }
00999 
01004                         
01015                         if (!(infoGlobal.m_solverMode & B3_SOLVER_ENABLE_FRICTION_DIRECTION_CACHING) || !cp.m_lateralFrictionInitialized)
01016                         {
01017                                 cp.m_lateralFrictionDir1 = vel - cp.m_normalWorldOnB * rel_vel;
01018                                 b3Scalar lat_rel_vel = cp.m_lateralFrictionDir1.length2();
01019                                 if (!(infoGlobal.m_solverMode & B3_SOLVER_DISABLE_VELOCITY_DEPENDENT_FRICTION_DIRECTION) && lat_rel_vel > B3_EPSILON)
01020                                 {
01021                                         cp.m_lateralFrictionDir1 *= 1.f/b3Sqrt(lat_rel_vel);
01022                                         if((infoGlobal.m_solverMode & B3_SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS))
01023                                         {
01024                                                 cp.m_lateralFrictionDir2 = cp.m_lateralFrictionDir1.cross(cp.m_normalWorldOnB);
01025                                                 cp.m_lateralFrictionDir2.normalize();//??
01026                                                 addFrictionConstraint(bodies,inertias,cp.m_lateralFrictionDir2,solverBodyIdA,solverBodyIdB,frictionIndex,cp,rel_pos1,rel_pos2,colObj0,colObj1, relaxation);
01027 
01028                                         }
01029 
01030                                         addFrictionConstraint(bodies,inertias,cp.m_lateralFrictionDir1,solverBodyIdA,solverBodyIdB,frictionIndex,cp,rel_pos1,rel_pos2,colObj0,colObj1, relaxation);
01031 
01032                                 } else
01033                                 {
01034                                         b3PlaneSpace1(cp.m_normalWorldOnB,cp.m_lateralFrictionDir1,cp.m_lateralFrictionDir2);
01035 
01036                                         if ((infoGlobal.m_solverMode & B3_SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS))
01037                                         {
01038                                                 addFrictionConstraint(bodies,inertias,cp.m_lateralFrictionDir2,solverBodyIdA,solverBodyIdB,frictionIndex,cp,rel_pos1,rel_pos2,colObj0,colObj1, relaxation);
01039                                         }
01040 
01041                                         addFrictionConstraint(bodies,inertias,cp.m_lateralFrictionDir1,solverBodyIdA,solverBodyIdB,frictionIndex,cp,rel_pos1,rel_pos2,colObj0,colObj1, relaxation);
01042 
01043                                         if ((infoGlobal.m_solverMode & B3_SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS) && (infoGlobal.m_solverMode & B3_SOLVER_DISABLE_VELOCITY_DEPENDENT_FRICTION_DIRECTION))
01044                                         {
01045                                                 cp.m_lateralFrictionInitialized = true;
01046                                         }
01047                                 }
01048 
01049                         } else
01050                         {
01051                                 addFrictionConstraint(bodies,inertias,cp.m_lateralFrictionDir1,solverBodyIdA,solverBodyIdB,frictionIndex,cp,rel_pos1,rel_pos2,colObj0,colObj1, relaxation,cp.m_contactMotion1, cp.m_contactCFM1);
01052 
01053                                 if ((infoGlobal.m_solverMode & B3_SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS))
01054                                         addFrictionConstraint(bodies,inertias,cp.m_lateralFrictionDir2,solverBodyIdA,solverBodyIdB,frictionIndex,cp,rel_pos1,rel_pos2,colObj0,colObj1, relaxation, cp.m_contactMotion2, cp.m_contactCFM2);
01055 
01056                                 setFrictionConstraintImpulse( bodies,inertias,solverConstraint, solverBodyIdA, solverBodyIdB, cp, infoGlobal);
01057                         }
01058                 
01059 
01060                         
01061 
01062                 }
01063         }
01064 }
01065 
01066 b3Scalar b3PgsJacobiSolver::solveGroupCacheFriendlySetup(b3RigidBodyData* bodies, b3InertiaData* inertias, int numBodies, b3Contact4* manifoldPtr, int numManifolds,b3TypedConstraint** constraints,int numConstraints,const b3ContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal)
01067 {
01068         B3_PROFILE("solveGroupCacheFriendlySetup");
01069 
01070 
01071         m_maxOverrideNumSolverIterations = 0;
01072 
01073 
01074 
01075         m_tmpSolverBodyPool.resize(0);
01076         
01077         
01078         m_bodyCount.resize(0);
01079         m_bodyCount.resize(numBodies,0);
01080         m_bodyCountCheck.resize(0);
01081         m_bodyCountCheck.resize(numBodies,0);
01082         
01083         m_deltaLinearVelocities.resize(0);
01084         m_deltaLinearVelocities.resize(numBodies,b3MakeVector3(0,0,0));
01085         m_deltaAngularVelocities.resize(0);
01086         m_deltaAngularVelocities.resize(numBodies,b3MakeVector3(0,0,0));
01087         
01088         //int totalBodies = 0;
01089 
01090         for (int i=0;i<numConstraints;i++)
01091         {
01092                 int bodyIndexA = constraints[i]->getRigidBodyA();
01093                 int bodyIndexB = constraints[i]->getRigidBodyB();
01094                 if (m_usePgs)
01095                 {
01096                         m_bodyCount[bodyIndexA]=-1;
01097                         m_bodyCount[bodyIndexB]=-1;
01098                 } else
01099                 {
01100                         //didn't implement joints with Jacobi version yet
01101                         b3Assert(0);
01102                 }
01103 
01104         }
01105         for (int i=0;i<numManifolds;i++)
01106         {
01107                 int bodyIndexA = manifoldPtr[i].getBodyA();
01108                 int bodyIndexB = manifoldPtr[i].getBodyB();
01109                 if (m_usePgs)
01110                 {
01111                         m_bodyCount[bodyIndexA]=-1;
01112                         m_bodyCount[bodyIndexB]=-1;
01113                 } else
01114                 {
01115                         if (bodies[bodyIndexA].m_invMass)
01116                         {
01117                                 //m_bodyCount[bodyIndexA]+=manifoldPtr[i].getNPoints();
01118                                 m_bodyCount[bodyIndexA]++;
01119                         }
01120                         else
01121                                 m_bodyCount[bodyIndexA]=-1;
01122 
01123                         if (bodies[bodyIndexB].m_invMass)
01124                         //      m_bodyCount[bodyIndexB]+=manifoldPtr[i].getNPoints();
01125                                 m_bodyCount[bodyIndexB]++;
01126                         else
01127                                 m_bodyCount[bodyIndexB]=-1;
01128                 }
01129 
01130         }
01131 
01132 
01133         
01134         if (1)
01135         {
01136                 int j;
01137                 for (j=0;j<numConstraints;j++)
01138                 {
01139                         b3TypedConstraint* constraint = constraints[j];
01140                         
01141                         constraint->internalSetAppliedImpulse(0.0f);
01142                 }
01143         }
01144 
01145         //b3RigidBody* rb0=0,*rb1=0;
01146         //if (1)
01147         {
01148                 {
01149 
01150                         int totalNumRows = 0;
01151                         int i;
01152                         
01153                         m_tmpConstraintSizesPool.resizeNoInitialize(numConstraints);
01154                         //calculate the total number of contraint rows
01155                         for (i=0;i<numConstraints;i++)
01156                         {
01157                                 b3TypedConstraint::b3ConstraintInfo1& info1 = m_tmpConstraintSizesPool[i];
01158                                 b3JointFeedback* fb = constraints[i]->getJointFeedback();
01159                                 if (fb)
01160                                 {
01161                                         fb->m_appliedForceBodyA.setZero();
01162                                         fb->m_appliedTorqueBodyA.setZero();
01163                                         fb->m_appliedForceBodyB.setZero();
01164                                         fb->m_appliedTorqueBodyB.setZero();
01165                                 }
01166 
01167                                 if (constraints[i]->isEnabled())
01168                                 {
01169                                 }
01170                                 if (constraints[i]->isEnabled())
01171                                 {
01172                                         constraints[i]->getInfo1(&info1,bodies);
01173                                 } else
01174                                 {
01175                                         info1.m_numConstraintRows = 0;
01176                                         info1.nub = 0;
01177                                 }
01178                                 totalNumRows += info1.m_numConstraintRows;
01179                         }
01180                         m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool.resizeNoInitialize(totalNumRows);
01181 
01182                         
01183 #ifndef DISABLE_JOINTS
01185                         int currentRow = 0;
01186 
01187                         for (i=0;i<numConstraints;i++)
01188                         {
01189                                 const b3TypedConstraint::b3ConstraintInfo1& info1 = m_tmpConstraintSizesPool[i];
01190                                 
01191                                 if (info1.m_numConstraintRows)
01192                                 {
01193                                         b3Assert(currentRow<totalNumRows);
01194 
01195                                         b3SolverConstraint* currentConstraintRow = &m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool[currentRow];
01196                                         b3TypedConstraint* constraint = constraints[i];
01197 
01198                                         b3RigidBodyData& rbA = bodies[ constraint->getRigidBodyA()];
01199                                         //b3RigidBody& rbA = constraint->getRigidBodyA();
01200         //                              b3RigidBody& rbB = constraint->getRigidBodyB();
01201                                         b3RigidBodyData& rbB = bodies[ constraint->getRigidBodyB()];
01202 
01203                     int solverBodyIdA = getOrInitSolverBody(constraint->getRigidBodyA(),bodies,inertias);
01204                     int solverBodyIdB = getOrInitSolverBody(constraint->getRigidBodyB(),bodies,inertias);
01205 
01206                     b3SolverBody* bodyAPtr = &m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdA];
01207                     b3SolverBody* bodyBPtr = &m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdB];
01208 
01209 
01210 
01211 
01212                                         int overrideNumSolverIterations = constraint->getOverrideNumSolverIterations() > 0 ? constraint->getOverrideNumSolverIterations() : infoGlobal.m_numIterations;
01213                                         if (overrideNumSolverIterations>m_maxOverrideNumSolverIterations)
01214                                                 m_maxOverrideNumSolverIterations = overrideNumSolverIterations;
01215 
01216 
01217                                         int j;
01218                                         for ( j=0;j<info1.m_numConstraintRows;j++)
01219                                         {
01220                                                 memset(&currentConstraintRow[j],0,sizeof(b3SolverConstraint));
01221                                                 currentConstraintRow[j].m_lowerLimit = -B3_INFINITY;
01222                                                 currentConstraintRow[j].m_upperLimit = B3_INFINITY;
01223                                                 currentConstraintRow[j].m_appliedImpulse = 0.f;
01224                                                 currentConstraintRow[j].m_appliedPushImpulse = 0.f;
01225                                                 currentConstraintRow[j].m_solverBodyIdA = solverBodyIdA;
01226                                                 currentConstraintRow[j].m_solverBodyIdB = solverBodyIdB;
01227                                                 currentConstraintRow[j].m_overrideNumSolverIterations = overrideNumSolverIterations;
01228                                         }
01229 
01230                                         bodyAPtr->internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
01231                                         bodyAPtr->internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
01232                                         bodyAPtr->internalGetPushVelocity().setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
01233                                         bodyAPtr->internalGetTurnVelocity().setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
01234                                         bodyBPtr->internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
01235                                         bodyBPtr->internalGetDeltaAngularVelocity().setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
01236                                         bodyBPtr->internalGetPushVelocity().setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
01237                                         bodyBPtr->internalGetTurnVelocity().setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
01238 
01239 
01240                                         b3TypedConstraint::b3ConstraintInfo2 info2;
01241                                         info2.fps = 1.f/infoGlobal.m_timeStep;
01242                                         info2.erp = infoGlobal.m_erp;
01243                                         info2.m_J1linearAxis = currentConstraintRow->m_contactNormal;
01244                                         info2.m_J1angularAxis = currentConstraintRow->m_relpos1CrossNormal;
01245                                         info2.m_J2linearAxis = 0;
01246                                         info2.m_J2angularAxis = currentConstraintRow->m_relpos2CrossNormal;
01247                                         info2.rowskip = sizeof(b3SolverConstraint)/sizeof(b3Scalar);//check this
01249                             b3Assert(info2.rowskip*sizeof(b3Scalar)== sizeof(b3SolverConstraint));
01250                                         info2.m_constraintError = &currentConstraintRow->m_rhs;
01251                                         currentConstraintRow->m_cfm = infoGlobal.m_globalCfm;
01252                                         info2.m_damping = infoGlobal.m_damping;
01253                                         info2.cfm = &currentConstraintRow->m_cfm;
01254                                         info2.m_lowerLimit = &currentConstraintRow->m_lowerLimit;
01255                                         info2.m_upperLimit = &currentConstraintRow->m_upperLimit;
01256                                         info2.m_numIterations = infoGlobal.m_numIterations;
01257                                         constraints[i]->getInfo2(&info2,bodies);
01258 
01260                                         for ( j=0;j<info1.m_numConstraintRows;j++)
01261                                         {
01262                                                 b3SolverConstraint& solverConstraint = currentConstraintRow[j];
01263 
01264                                                 if (solverConstraint.m_upperLimit>=constraints[i]->getBreakingImpulseThreshold())
01265                                                 {
01266                                                         solverConstraint.m_upperLimit = constraints[i]->getBreakingImpulseThreshold();
01267                                                 }
01268 
01269                                                 if (solverConstraint.m_lowerLimit<=-constraints[i]->getBreakingImpulseThreshold())
01270                                                 {
01271                                                         solverConstraint.m_lowerLimit = -constraints[i]->getBreakingImpulseThreshold();
01272                                                 }
01273 
01274                                                 solverConstraint.m_originalContactPoint = constraint;
01275                                                         
01276                                                 b3Matrix3x3& invInertiaWorldA= inertias[constraint->getRigidBodyA()].m_invInertiaWorld;
01277                                                 {
01278 
01279                                                         //b3Vector3 angularFactorA(1,1,1);
01280                                                         const b3Vector3& ftorqueAxis1 = solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal;
01281                                                         solverConstraint.m_angularComponentA = invInertiaWorldA*ftorqueAxis1;//*angularFactorA;
01282                                                 }
01283                                                 
01284                                                 b3Matrix3x3& invInertiaWorldB= inertias[constraint->getRigidBodyB()].m_invInertiaWorld;
01285                                                 {
01286 
01287                                                         const b3Vector3& ftorqueAxis2 = solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal;
01288                                                         solverConstraint.m_angularComponentB = invInertiaWorldB*ftorqueAxis2;//*constraint->getRigidBodyB().getAngularFactor();
01289                                                 }
01290 
01291                                                 {
01292                                                         //it is ok to use solverConstraint.m_contactNormal instead of -solverConstraint.m_contactNormal
01293                                                         //because it gets multiplied iMJlB
01294                                                         b3Vector3 iMJlA = solverConstraint.m_contactNormal*rbA.m_invMass;
01295                                                         b3Vector3 iMJaA = invInertiaWorldA*solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal;
01296                                                         b3Vector3 iMJlB = solverConstraint.m_contactNormal*rbB.m_invMass;//sign of normal?
01297                                                         b3Vector3 iMJaB = invInertiaWorldB*solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal;
01298 
01299                                                         b3Scalar sum = iMJlA.dot(solverConstraint.m_contactNormal);
01300                                                         sum += iMJaA.dot(solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal);
01301                                                         sum += iMJlB.dot(solverConstraint.m_contactNormal);
01302                                                         sum += iMJaB.dot(solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal);
01303                                                         b3Scalar fsum = b3Fabs(sum);
01304                                                         b3Assert(fsum > B3_EPSILON);
01305                                                         solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv = fsum>B3_EPSILON?b3Scalar(1.)/sum : 0.f;
01306                                                 }
01307 
01308 
01311                                                 {
01312                                                         b3Scalar rel_vel;
01313                                                         b3Scalar vel1Dotn = solverConstraint.m_contactNormal.dot(rbA.m_linVel) + solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal.dot(rbA.m_angVel);
01314                                                         b3Scalar vel2Dotn = -solverConstraint.m_contactNormal.dot(rbB.m_linVel) + solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal.dot(rbB.m_angVel);
01315 
01316                                                         rel_vel = vel1Dotn+vel2Dotn;
01317 
01318                                                         b3Scalar restitution = 0.f;
01319                                                         b3Scalar positionalError = solverConstraint.m_rhs;//already filled in by getConstraintInfo2
01320                                                         b3Scalar        velocityError = restitution - rel_vel * info2.m_damping;
01321                                                         b3Scalar        penetrationImpulse = positionalError*solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv;
01322                                                         b3Scalar        velocityImpulse = velocityError *solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv;
01323                                                         solverConstraint.m_rhs = penetrationImpulse+velocityImpulse;
01324                                                         solverConstraint.m_appliedImpulse = 0.f;
01325 
01326                                                 }
01327                                         }
01328                                 }
01329                                 currentRow+=m_tmpConstraintSizesPool[i].m_numConstraintRows;
01330                         }
01331 #endif //DISABLE_JOINTS
01332                 }
01333 
01334 
01335                 {
01336                         int i;
01337 
01338                         for (i=0;i<numManifolds;i++)
01339                         {
01340                                 b3Contact4& manifold = manifoldPtr[i];
01341                                 convertContact(bodies,inertias,&manifold,infoGlobal);
01342                         }
01343                 }
01344         }
01345 
01346 //      b3ContactSolverInfo info = infoGlobal;
01347 
01348 
01349         int numNonContactPool = m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool.size();
01350         int numConstraintPool = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool.size();
01351         int numFrictionPool = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool.size();
01352 
01354         m_orderNonContactConstraintPool.resizeNoInitialize(numNonContactPool);
01355         if ((infoGlobal.m_solverMode & B3_SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS))
01356                 m_orderTmpConstraintPool.resizeNoInitialize(numConstraintPool*2);
01357         else
01358                 m_orderTmpConstraintPool.resizeNoInitialize(numConstraintPool);
01359 
01360         m_orderFrictionConstraintPool.resizeNoInitialize(numFrictionPool);
01361         {
01362                 int i;
01363                 for (i=0;i<numNonContactPool;i++)
01364                 {
01365                         m_orderNonContactConstraintPool[i] = i;
01366                 }
01367                 for (i=0;i<numConstraintPool;i++)
01368                 {
01369                         m_orderTmpConstraintPool[i] = i;
01370                 }
01371                 for (i=0;i<numFrictionPool;i++)
01372                 {
01373                         m_orderFrictionConstraintPool[i] = i;
01374                 }
01375         }
01376 
01377         return 0.f;
01378 
01379 }
01380 
01381 
01382 b3Scalar b3PgsJacobiSolver::solveSingleIteration(int iteration,b3TypedConstraint** constraints,int numConstraints,const b3ContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal)
01383 {
01384 
01385         int numNonContactPool = m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool.size();
01386         int numConstraintPool = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool.size();
01387         int numFrictionPool = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool.size();
01388         
01389         if (infoGlobal.m_solverMode & B3_SOLVER_RANDMIZE_ORDER)
01390         {
01391                 if (1)                  // uncomment this for a bit less random ((iteration & 7) == 0)
01392                 {
01393 
01394                         for (int j=0; j<numNonContactPool; ++j) {
01395                                 int tmp = m_orderNonContactConstraintPool[j];
01396                                 int swapi = b3RandInt2(j+1);
01397                                 m_orderNonContactConstraintPool[j] = m_orderNonContactConstraintPool[swapi];
01398                                 m_orderNonContactConstraintPool[swapi] = tmp;
01399                         }
01400 
01401                         //contact/friction constraints are not solved more than 
01402                         if (iteration< infoGlobal.m_numIterations)
01403                         {
01404                                 for (int j=0; j<numConstraintPool; ++j) {
01405                                         int tmp = m_orderTmpConstraintPool[j];
01406                                         int swapi = b3RandInt2(j+1);
01407                                         m_orderTmpConstraintPool[j] = m_orderTmpConstraintPool[swapi];
01408                                         m_orderTmpConstraintPool[swapi] = tmp;
01409                                 }
01410 
01411                                 for (int j=0; j<numFrictionPool; ++j) {
01412                                         int tmp = m_orderFrictionConstraintPool[j];
01413                                         int swapi = b3RandInt2(j+1);
01414                                         m_orderFrictionConstraintPool[j] = m_orderFrictionConstraintPool[swapi];
01415                                         m_orderFrictionConstraintPool[swapi] = tmp;
01416                                 }
01417                         }
01418                 }
01419         }
01420 
01421         if (infoGlobal.m_solverMode & B3_SOLVER_SIMD)
01422         {
01424                 for (int j=0;j<m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool.size();j++)
01425                 {
01426                         b3SolverConstraint& constraint = m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool[m_orderNonContactConstraintPool[j]];
01427                         if (iteration < constraint.m_overrideNumSolverIterations)
01428                                 resolveSingleConstraintRowGenericSIMD(m_tmpSolverBodyPool[constraint.m_solverBodyIdA],m_tmpSolverBodyPool[constraint.m_solverBodyIdB],constraint);
01429                 }
01430 
01431                 if (iteration< infoGlobal.m_numIterations)
01432                 {
01433 
01435                         if (infoGlobal.m_solverMode & B3_SOLVER_INTERLEAVE_CONTACT_AND_FRICTION_CONSTRAINTS)
01436                         {
01437                                 int numPoolConstraints = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool.size();
01438                                 int multiplier = (infoGlobal.m_solverMode & B3_SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS)? 2 : 1;
01439 
01440                                 for (int c=0;c<numPoolConstraints;c++)
01441                                 {
01442                                         b3Scalar totalImpulse =0;
01443 
01444                                         {
01445                                                 const b3SolverConstraint& solveManifold = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool[m_orderTmpConstraintPool[c]];
01446                                                 resolveSingleConstraintRowLowerLimitSIMD(m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdA],m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdB],solveManifold);
01447                                                 totalImpulse = solveManifold.m_appliedImpulse;
01448                                         }
01449                                         bool applyFriction = true;
01450                                         if (applyFriction)
01451                                         {
01452                                                 {
01453 
01454                                                         b3SolverConstraint& solveManifold = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool[m_orderFrictionConstraintPool[c*multiplier]];
01455 
01456                                                         if (totalImpulse>b3Scalar(0))
01457                                                         {
01458                                                                 solveManifold.m_lowerLimit = -(solveManifold.m_friction*totalImpulse);
01459                                                                 solveManifold.m_upperLimit = solveManifold.m_friction*totalImpulse;
01460 
01461                                                                 resolveSingleConstraintRowGenericSIMD(m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdA],m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdB],solveManifold);
01462                                                         }
01463                                                 }
01464 
01465                                                 if (infoGlobal.m_solverMode & B3_SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS)
01466                                                 {
01467 
01468                                                         b3SolverConstraint& solveManifold = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool[m_orderFrictionConstraintPool[c*multiplier+1]];
01469                                 
01470                                                         if (totalImpulse>b3Scalar(0))
01471                                                         {
01472                                                                 solveManifold.m_lowerLimit = -(solveManifold.m_friction*totalImpulse);
01473                                                                 solveManifold.m_upperLimit = solveManifold.m_friction*totalImpulse;
01474 
01475                                                                 resolveSingleConstraintRowGenericSIMD(m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdA],m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdB],solveManifold);
01476                                                         }
01477                                                 }
01478                                         }
01479                                 }
01480 
01481                         }
01482                         else//B3_SOLVER_INTERLEAVE_CONTACT_AND_FRICTION_CONSTRAINTS
01483                         {
01484                                 //solve the friction constraints after all contact constraints, don't interleave them
01485                                 int numPoolConstraints = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool.size();
01486                                 int j;
01487 
01488                                 for (j=0;j<numPoolConstraints;j++)
01489                                 {
01490                                         const b3SolverConstraint& solveManifold = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool[m_orderTmpConstraintPool[j]];
01491                                         resolveSingleConstraintRowLowerLimitSIMD(m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdA],m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdB],solveManifold);
01492 
01493                                 }
01494 
01495                                 if (!m_usePgs)
01496                                         averageVelocities();
01497                                 
01498 
01500 
01501                                 int numFrictionPoolConstraints = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool.size();
01502                                 for (j=0;j<numFrictionPoolConstraints;j++)
01503                                 {
01504                                         b3SolverConstraint& solveManifold = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool[m_orderFrictionConstraintPool[j]];
01505                                         b3Scalar totalImpulse = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool[solveManifold.m_frictionIndex].m_appliedImpulse;
01506 
01507                                         if (totalImpulse>b3Scalar(0))
01508                                         {
01509                                                 solveManifold.m_lowerLimit = -(solveManifold.m_friction*totalImpulse);
01510                                                 solveManifold.m_upperLimit = solveManifold.m_friction*totalImpulse;
01511 
01512                                                 resolveSingleConstraintRowGenericSIMD(m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdA],m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdB],solveManifold);
01513                                         }
01514                                 }
01515 
01516                                 
01517                                 int numRollingFrictionPoolConstraints = m_tmpSolverContactRollingFrictionConstraintPool.size();
01518                                 for (j=0;j<numRollingFrictionPoolConstraints;j++)
01519                                 {
01520 
01521                                         b3SolverConstraint& rollingFrictionConstraint = m_tmpSolverContactRollingFrictionConstraintPool[j];
01522                                         b3Scalar totalImpulse = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool[rollingFrictionConstraint.m_frictionIndex].m_appliedImpulse;
01523                                         if (totalImpulse>b3Scalar(0))
01524                                         {
01525                                                 b3Scalar rollingFrictionMagnitude = rollingFrictionConstraint.m_friction*totalImpulse;
01526                                                 if (rollingFrictionMagnitude>rollingFrictionConstraint.m_friction)
01527                                                         rollingFrictionMagnitude = rollingFrictionConstraint.m_friction;
01528 
01529                                                 rollingFrictionConstraint.m_lowerLimit = -rollingFrictionMagnitude;
01530                                                 rollingFrictionConstraint.m_upperLimit = rollingFrictionMagnitude;
01531 
01532                                                 resolveSingleConstraintRowGenericSIMD(m_tmpSolverBodyPool[rollingFrictionConstraint.m_solverBodyIdA],m_tmpSolverBodyPool[rollingFrictionConstraint.m_solverBodyIdB],rollingFrictionConstraint);
01533                                         }
01534                                 }
01535                                 
01536 
01537                         }                       
01538                 }
01539         } else
01540         {
01541                 //non-SIMD version
01543                 for (int j=0;j<m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool.size();j++)
01544                 {
01545                         b3SolverConstraint& constraint = m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool[m_orderNonContactConstraintPool[j]];
01546                         if (iteration < constraint.m_overrideNumSolverIterations)
01547                                 resolveSingleConstraintRowGeneric(m_tmpSolverBodyPool[constraint.m_solverBodyIdA],m_tmpSolverBodyPool[constraint.m_solverBodyIdB],constraint);
01548                 }
01549 
01550                 if (iteration< infoGlobal.m_numIterations)
01551                 {
01552 
01554                         int numPoolConstraints = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool.size();
01555                         for (int j=0;j<numPoolConstraints;j++)
01556                         {
01557                                 const b3SolverConstraint& solveManifold = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool[m_orderTmpConstraintPool[j]];
01558                                 resolveSingleConstraintRowLowerLimit(m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdA],m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdB],solveManifold);
01559                         }
01561                         int numFrictionPoolConstraints = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool.size();
01562                         for (int j=0;j<numFrictionPoolConstraints;j++)
01563                         {
01564                                 b3SolverConstraint& solveManifold = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool[m_orderFrictionConstraintPool[j]];
01565                                 b3Scalar totalImpulse = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool[solveManifold.m_frictionIndex].m_appliedImpulse;
01566 
01567                                 if (totalImpulse>b3Scalar(0))
01568                                 {
01569                                         solveManifold.m_lowerLimit = -(solveManifold.m_friction*totalImpulse);
01570                                         solveManifold.m_upperLimit = solveManifold.m_friction*totalImpulse;
01571 
01572                                         resolveSingleConstraintRowGeneric(m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdA],m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdB],solveManifold);
01573                                 }
01574                         }
01575 
01576                         int numRollingFrictionPoolConstraints = m_tmpSolverContactRollingFrictionConstraintPool.size();
01577                         for (int j=0;j<numRollingFrictionPoolConstraints;j++)
01578                         {
01579                                 b3SolverConstraint& rollingFrictionConstraint = m_tmpSolverContactRollingFrictionConstraintPool[j];
01580                                 b3Scalar totalImpulse = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool[rollingFrictionConstraint.m_frictionIndex].m_appliedImpulse;
01581                                 if (totalImpulse>b3Scalar(0))
01582                                 {
01583                                         b3Scalar rollingFrictionMagnitude = rollingFrictionConstraint.m_friction*totalImpulse;
01584                                         if (rollingFrictionMagnitude>rollingFrictionConstraint.m_friction)
01585                                                 rollingFrictionMagnitude = rollingFrictionConstraint.m_friction;
01586 
01587                                         rollingFrictionConstraint.m_lowerLimit = -rollingFrictionMagnitude;
01588                                         rollingFrictionConstraint.m_upperLimit = rollingFrictionMagnitude;
01589 
01590                                         resolveSingleConstraintRowGeneric(m_tmpSolverBodyPool[rollingFrictionConstraint.m_solverBodyIdA],m_tmpSolverBodyPool[rollingFrictionConstraint.m_solverBodyIdB],rollingFrictionConstraint);
01591                                 }
01592                         }
01593                 }
01594         }
01595         return 0.f;
01596 }
01597 
01598 
01599 void b3PgsJacobiSolver::solveGroupCacheFriendlySplitImpulseIterations(b3TypedConstraint** constraints,int numConstraints,const b3ContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal)
01600 {
01601         int iteration;
01602         if (infoGlobal.m_splitImpulse)
01603         {
01604                 if (infoGlobal.m_solverMode & B3_SOLVER_SIMD)
01605                 {
01606                         for ( iteration = 0;iteration<infoGlobal.m_numIterations;iteration++)
01607                         {
01608                                 {
01609                                         int numPoolConstraints = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool.size();
01610                                         int j;
01611                                         for (j=0;j<numPoolConstraints;j++)
01612                                         {
01613                                                 const b3SolverConstraint& solveManifold = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool[m_orderTmpConstraintPool[j]];
01614 
01615                                                 resolveSplitPenetrationSIMD(m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdA],m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdB],solveManifold);
01616                                         }
01617                                 }
01618                         }
01619                 }
01620                 else
01621                 {
01622                         for ( iteration = 0;iteration<infoGlobal.m_numIterations;iteration++)
01623                         {
01624                                 {
01625                                         int numPoolConstraints = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool.size();
01626                                         int j;
01627                                         for (j=0;j<numPoolConstraints;j++)
01628                                         {
01629                                                 const b3SolverConstraint& solveManifold = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool[m_orderTmpConstraintPool[j]];
01630 
01631                                                 resolveSplitPenetrationImpulseCacheFriendly(m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdA],m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solveManifold.m_solverBodyIdB],solveManifold);
01632                                         }
01633                                 }
01634                         }
01635                 }
01636         }
01637 }
01638 
01639 b3Scalar b3PgsJacobiSolver::solveGroupCacheFriendlyIterations(b3TypedConstraint** constraints,int numConstraints,const b3ContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal)
01640 {
01641         B3_PROFILE("solveGroupCacheFriendlyIterations");
01642 
01643         {
01645                 solveGroupCacheFriendlySplitImpulseIterations(constraints,numConstraints,infoGlobal);
01646 
01647                 int maxIterations = m_maxOverrideNumSolverIterations > infoGlobal.m_numIterations? m_maxOverrideNumSolverIterations : infoGlobal.m_numIterations;
01648 
01649                 for ( int iteration = 0 ; iteration< maxIterations ; iteration++)
01650                 //for ( int iteration = maxIterations-1  ; iteration >= 0;iteration--)
01651                 {                       
01652                         
01653                         solveSingleIteration(iteration, constraints,numConstraints,infoGlobal);
01654 
01655 
01656                         if (!m_usePgs)
01657                         {
01658                                 averageVelocities();
01659                         }
01660                 }
01661                 
01662         }
01663         return 0.f;
01664 }
01665 
01666 void    b3PgsJacobiSolver::averageVelocities()
01667 {
01668         B3_PROFILE("averaging");
01669         //average the velocities
01670         int numBodies = m_bodyCount.size();
01671 
01672         m_deltaLinearVelocities.resize(0);
01673         m_deltaLinearVelocities.resize(numBodies,b3MakeVector3(0,0,0));
01674         m_deltaAngularVelocities.resize(0);
01675         m_deltaAngularVelocities.resize(numBodies,b3MakeVector3(0,0,0));
01676 
01677         for (int i=0;i<m_tmpSolverBodyPool.size();i++)
01678         {
01679                 if (!m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].m_invMass.isZero())
01680                 {
01681                         int orgBodyIndex = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].m_originalBodyIndex;
01682                         m_deltaLinearVelocities[orgBodyIndex]+=m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].getDeltaLinearVelocity();
01683                         m_deltaAngularVelocities[orgBodyIndex]+=m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].getDeltaAngularVelocity();
01684                 }
01685         }
01686                                 
01687         for (int i=0;i<m_tmpSolverBodyPool.size();i++)
01688         {
01689                 int orgBodyIndex = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].m_originalBodyIndex;
01690 
01691                 if (!m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].m_invMass.isZero())
01692                 {
01693                                                 
01694                         b3Assert(m_bodyCount[orgBodyIndex] == m_bodyCountCheck[orgBodyIndex]);
01695                                                 
01696                         b3Scalar factor = 1.f/b3Scalar(m_bodyCount[orgBodyIndex]);
01697                                                 
01698 
01699                         m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].m_deltaLinearVelocity = m_deltaLinearVelocities[orgBodyIndex]*factor;
01700                         m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].m_deltaAngularVelocity = m_deltaAngularVelocities[orgBodyIndex]*factor;
01701                 }
01702         }
01703 }
01704 
01705 b3Scalar b3PgsJacobiSolver::solveGroupCacheFriendlyFinish(b3RigidBodyData* bodies,b3InertiaData* inertias,int numBodies,const b3ContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal)
01706 {
01707         B3_PROFILE("solveGroupCacheFriendlyFinish");
01708         int numPoolConstraints = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool.size();
01709         int i,j;
01710 
01711         if (infoGlobal.m_solverMode & B3_SOLVER_USE_WARMSTARTING)
01712         {
01713                 for (j=0;j<numPoolConstraints;j++)
01714                 {
01715                         const b3SolverConstraint& solveManifold = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool[j];
01716                         b3ContactPoint* pt = (b3ContactPoint*) solveManifold.m_originalContactPoint;
01717                         b3Assert(pt);
01718                         pt->m_appliedImpulse = solveManifold.m_appliedImpulse;
01719                 //      float f = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool[solveManifold.m_frictionIndex].m_appliedImpulse;
01720                         //      printf("pt->m_appliedImpulseLateral1 = %f\n", f);
01721                         pt->m_appliedImpulseLateral1 = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool[solveManifold.m_frictionIndex].m_appliedImpulse;
01722                         //printf("pt->m_appliedImpulseLateral1 = %f\n", pt->m_appliedImpulseLateral1);
01723                         if ((infoGlobal.m_solverMode & B3_SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS))
01724                         {
01725                                 pt->m_appliedImpulseLateral2 = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool[solveManifold.m_frictionIndex+1].m_appliedImpulse;
01726                         }
01727                         //do a callback here?
01728                 }
01729         }
01730 
01731         numPoolConstraints = m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool.size();
01732         for (j=0;j<numPoolConstraints;j++)
01733         {
01734                 const b3SolverConstraint& solverConstr = m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool[j];
01735                 b3TypedConstraint* constr = (b3TypedConstraint*)solverConstr.m_originalContactPoint;
01736                 b3JointFeedback* fb = constr->getJointFeedback();
01737                 if (fb)
01738                 {
01739                         b3SolverBody* bodyA = &m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverConstr.m_solverBodyIdA];
01740                         b3SolverBody* bodyB = &m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverConstr.m_solverBodyIdB];
01741 
01742                         fb->m_appliedForceBodyA += solverConstr.m_contactNormal*solverConstr.m_appliedImpulse*bodyA->m_linearFactor/infoGlobal.m_timeStep;
01743                         fb->m_appliedForceBodyB += -solverConstr.m_contactNormal*solverConstr.m_appliedImpulse*bodyB->m_linearFactor/infoGlobal.m_timeStep;
01744                         fb->m_appliedTorqueBodyA += solverConstr.m_relpos1CrossNormal* bodyA->m_angularFactor*solverConstr.m_appliedImpulse/infoGlobal.m_timeStep;
01745                         fb->m_appliedTorqueBodyB += -solverConstr.m_relpos1CrossNormal* bodyB->m_angularFactor*solverConstr.m_appliedImpulse/infoGlobal.m_timeStep;
01746                         
01747                 }
01748 
01749                 constr->internalSetAppliedImpulse(solverConstr.m_appliedImpulse);
01750                 if (b3Fabs(solverConstr.m_appliedImpulse)>=constr->getBreakingImpulseThreshold())
01751                 {
01752                         constr->setEnabled(false);
01753                 }
01754         }
01755 
01756         {
01757                 B3_PROFILE("write back velocities and transforms");
01758                 for ( i=0;i<m_tmpSolverBodyPool.size();i++)
01759                 {
01760                         int bodyIndex = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].m_originalBodyIndex;
01761                         //b3Assert(i==bodyIndex);
01762 
01763                         b3RigidBodyData* body = &bodies[bodyIndex];
01764                         if (body->m_invMass)
01765                         {
01766                                 if (infoGlobal.m_splitImpulse)
01767                                         m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].writebackVelocityAndTransform(infoGlobal.m_timeStep, infoGlobal.m_splitImpulseTurnErp);
01768                                 else
01769                                         m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].writebackVelocity();
01770 
01771                                 if (m_usePgs)
01772                                 {
01773                                         body->m_linVel = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].m_linearVelocity;
01774                                         body->m_angVel = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].m_angularVelocity;
01775                                 } else
01776                                 {
01777                                         b3Scalar factor = 1.f/b3Scalar(m_bodyCount[bodyIndex]);
01778 
01779                                         b3Vector3 deltaLinVel = m_deltaLinearVelocities[bodyIndex]*factor;
01780                                         b3Vector3 deltaAngVel = m_deltaAngularVelocities[bodyIndex]*factor;
01781                                         //printf("body %d\n",bodyIndex);
01782                                         //printf("deltaLinVel = %f,%f,%f\n",deltaLinVel.getX(),deltaLinVel.getY(),deltaLinVel.getZ());
01783                                         //printf("deltaAngVel = %f,%f,%f\n",deltaAngVel.getX(),deltaAngVel.getY(),deltaAngVel.getZ());
01784 
01785                                         body->m_linVel += deltaLinVel;
01786                                         body->m_angVel += deltaAngVel;
01787                                 }
01788                         
01789                                 if (infoGlobal.m_splitImpulse)
01790                                 {
01791                                         body->m_pos = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].m_worldTransform.getOrigin();
01792                                         b3Quaternion orn;
01793                                         orn = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].m_worldTransform.getRotation();
01794                                         body->m_quat = orn;
01795                                 }
01796                         }
01797                 }
01798         }
01799 
01800 
01801         m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool.resizeNoInitialize(0);
01802         m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool.resizeNoInitialize(0);
01803         m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool.resizeNoInitialize(0);
01804         m_tmpSolverContactRollingFrictionConstraintPool.resizeNoInitialize(0);
01805 
01806         m_tmpSolverBodyPool.resizeNoInitialize(0);
01807         return 0.f;
01808 }

01811 
01812 void    b3PgsJacobiSolver::reset()
01813 {
01814         m_btSeed2 = 0;
01815 }
